directions: In a large bowl, combine vinegar, sugar, and salt. Mix in cucumbers, and marinate 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Gently toss tomatoes, onion, mint, and olive oil with the marinated cucumbers. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 2 large cucumbers, peeled, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch slices
title: Tomato Cucumber Salad with Mint
